t: Largest bubblegum bubble blown | Guinness World Records
s: January 16, 2020 - This record is for the largest bubblegum bubble blown in terms of the diameter of the bubble. This record is to be attempted by an individual. This record is measured in centimetres (cm) to the nearest 0.1 cm, with equivalent imperial measurements also given in inches (in).

t: Largest free floating soap bubble (outdoors) | Guinness World Records
s: October 12, 2018 - The largest outdoor free floating soap bubble has a volume of 96.27 m³ (3,399.7 ft³) and was achieved by Gary Pearlman (USA) in Cleveland, Ohio, USA, on 20 June 2015.

In 1995, Amazon made its online debut as a bookstore, eventually adding movies, music, electronics, computer software, and most other consumer goods to its diversified offerings. Amazon's initial public offering took place on May 15, 1997, at a price of $18 per share. It rose to more than $100 and subsequently dropped to less than $10 after the bubble burst.
